content: mini galaxy of change notes & tips are placed throughout and at the bottom of the pattern for your assistance please familiarize yourself with them before starting your project * *- repeat instructions between asterisks as many times as indicated - repeat within repeat repeat us crochet terminology used instructions between brackets as many times as indicated hook size h \ 5mm = combined stitches to be made in yarn red heart super saver next stitch next chain or next group yardage needed 960yds/ 878m beginning chain 1 does not count as a stitch throughout finished size - 39 /99cm other longer starting chains will be colors used specified as to what they represent 1 white - 75 yds/69 m 2 light blue 120 yds/110 m 3 delft blue 85 yds/78 m 4 blue - 85 yds/78 m 5 royal - 170 yds/155 m 6 soft navy - 215 yds/197 m 7 black - 210 yds/192 m page 2 of 7 this pattern is only available for download from ravelry com ©frank orandle mini galaxy of change abbreviations & stitches in top chain of single_crochet 12 single_crochet starting chain 2 72 bphdc round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in chain 5 chain 3 counts as 1st half_double_crochet increase* 5 times half_double_crochet in 2 sts join with slip_stitch in double_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 3 4 double_crochet in same chain 5 skip 2 sts 1st half_double_crochet 24 half_double_crochet *single_crochet in 2 sts skip 2 sts + 4 double_crochet chain 3 4 double_crochet in chain 5 skip 2 sts* 7 times repeat from * to +
